name: Tree Defense (Bimses)
description:
Due to lazyness

RULES WILL BE WRITTEN HERE

1. press space bar to chase away the lumberjacks (a get out speech bubble will pop up)
2.lumberjack will be spawning throughout the rounds until u chase away all of them
3. Boss level ( a truck) will be spawning lumberjack until you chase away the truck 
5. there's a free shop beside, no money is needed to purchase anything 
6. there are only 3 items in the shop ( stop sign, wall, potion)
7. when u go near the shop a menu will pop up for you to buy
8. click the item to purchase it ( only 1 at a time, every click overwrites the previous one)
9.stop sign : chase the lumberjack away for you ( 1 time use only)
10. wall : blocks lumberjack until lumberjack destroys it
11.potion : drop it near the tree and your tree will increase 1 health
12.there are 5 health on your tree by default
13. before the lumberjack chop down your tree
14. Chase them away
15. have fun
